text: Hello and welcome to this Bizmates for beginners video series for Japanese businesspeople.

So I will ask you,  how long have you worked for your company?
And you say...
I joined my company 5 years ago. 10 years ago. Did you get that?
Not enter, entered my company. I joined, OK.
So today's question is what do you think of...? Hmmm... very useful OK.
So imagine, Taro and I are colleagues. And Taro asks me for my opinion.
He says tell me your opinion. And he says, Hika, how do you think about this poster?
Imagine there's a poster. How do you think about this poster?
Hmm... now I say, yeah, I think it's really good. OK, but it's a strange question.
How do you think about this poster? It's a mistake OK. We don't say that.
What we should say if you want to know their opinion, you say this one.
What do you think of this poster? That's right. OK?
So Taro can say, what do you think of this poster?
And I'll say, yeah, I think it's really good. Very natural. Very useful because you can ask anyone.
What do you think of this watch? What do you think of this shirt?
OK. All right. Let's practice pronunciation. It's not what, but it's wha doya thinkof
wha doya thinkof, wha doya thinkof wha doya thinkof this poster? You try.
One more time. Wha doya thinkof this poster?
OK. So you ask me and I will answer OK? 1, 2, 3 go.
I think it's really good. Just like that. OK.
So for homework, you can ask me. What do you think of this poster?
And I will say,  yeah, I think it's really good.
